test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X red) (sort Y workspace))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (sort Y bed))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X worktable))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X can))) (:cons_not (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (plate X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X black)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X bed)))) (:cons_not (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X yellow) (sort Y microwave)))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X workspace)))) )
test.nl: There is a bottle which is red on the workspace. There is a white can on the bed. The door of the cupboard is closed. Go to the worktable. Put a bottle in the cupboard. Put a remotecontrol in the microwave. Pick up a can. Do not pick up the blue can. There must be a black remotecontrol on the plate. Do not go to the bed. DO not take out the yellow bottle from the microwave. Do not go to the workspace.
